title: Tesla's Strategic Shift: Betting Big on AI and Robotics
description: Tesla commits $2 billion to Elon Musk's AI venture, xAI, as it pivots from electric vehicles to artificial intelligence and robotics. Amid revenue challenges and increased competition, Tesla focuses on self-driving technology, robotaxis, and humanoid robots, bolstering its energy business and tech ambitions.
content: Tesla announced a $2 billion investment into CEO Elon Musk's AI company, xAI, aligning with its transition from a solely electric vehicle (EV) manufacturer to a broader AI and technology firm. The move supports Musk's goal to integrate AI capabilitie... [781 chars]

title: Microsoft shares slide after net income rises 60% to $38.5bn
description: Cloud division beating forecasts fails to quell concern over company’s expensive bet on artificial intelligence
content:
Investors are worried about whether hundreds of billions of dollars of investment on AI infrastructure will translate into profit growth.

title: The Real War of the Century: Artificial Intelligence
description: Examine the role of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in creating deterministic frameworks within contemporary institutions and systems.

title: Australia’s AI upside will hinge on upgrading public sector systems
description: Artificial intelligence has been pitched as a major productivity lever for Australia.
content:

title: India ready for larger global role in AI-led climate action: Dr Jitendra
description: Excelsior Correspondent NEW DELHI, Jan 28: Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Science and Technology and Earth Sciences, Dr Jitendra Singh, today said that India is ready to play a larger global role in Artificial Intelligence (AI) -led climate action. However, the Minister hastened to add, Artificial Intelligence must be deployed alongside human judgement, institutional cooperation and global partnerships if it is to effectively address climate change and build resilience against extreme weather events. Speaking at the Technology and […]

description: Samsung Electronics Co.’s chip unit blew past expectations with a more than five-fold profit gain in the December quarter, boosted by an artificial intelligence boom, and announced a $2.5 billion buyback.

title: Tesla To Invest $2 Billion In Elon Musk's xAI
description: Tesla will invest approximately $2 billion into CEO Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup, xAI.
content:

title: Asteroid that wiped out dinosaurs had limited impact on sharks and rays, study shows
description: A new study using advanced artificial intelligence (AI) has revealed that the asteroid strike that wiped out the dinosaurs 66 million years ago caused only a modest decline in shark and ray species. The findings, published in the journal Current Biology, challenge previous understandings of how severely this mass extinction affected life in the oceans.
